original: @191b * // de bzhin du sa gzhi ser po la rdzas rnams yang las dang mthun pa bsags la /
analyzed: @191b * // de bzhin du sa gzhi ser po la rdzas rnams yang las dang mthun pa bsags la /
translated: Likewise, on a yellow ground, one should gather the substances in accordance with the karma,

original: thab khung gru bzhi par rgyas pa'i sbyin sreg bya'o //
analyzed: thab khung gru bzhi par rgyas pa'i sbyin sreg bya'o //
translated: and one should perform the homa of increase in a square hearth.

original: de bzhin du sa gzhi dmar po la sogs par las dang mthun par rdzas bsags te /
analyzed: de bzhin du sa gzhi dmar po la sogs par las dang mthun par rdzas bsags te /
translated: Likewise, on a red ground, and so on, one should gather the substances in accordance with the karma,

original: thab khung zla gam byas te /
analyzed: thab khung zla gam byas te /
translated: and one should make a hearth that is a half-moon,
and one should perform the homa of power.

original: slob dpon tsandra go mi'i man ngag go //
analyzed: slob dpon tsandra go mi'i man ngag go //
translated: This is the esoteric instruction of the master Candragomin.
